name: Snake (itch) (RareChip)
description:
Snake is a classic retro game where your main goal is to eat apples to extend your snake's length. This is a recreation of Snake made with Unity. 

Unique features:

  • Customizable grid size
  • Customizable snake speed

This was another challenge/practice project for me. If you have any suggestions or bugs feel free to let me know because I quite like how this game turned out and am willing to continue to update it. 

Have fun!
